mapper.insert: insert into `order_item`(order_item_id, order_id, ticket_id, passenger_id) select #{orderItem.orderItemId}, #{orderItem.orderId}, ticket.ticket_id, #{orderItem.passengerId} from ticket INNER JOIN flight on ticket.flight_id = flight.flight_id where flight.first_class_count > 0 and ticket.flight_id = #{flightId}
